T02D1560:216a-0: @216a ` // phag mo thugs kyi sgrub thabs bzhugs//
T02D1560:216a-2: # // rje btsun ma rdo rje phag mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1560:216a-3: rje btsun ma ser mo'i gdams pa 'di nyams su len par 'dod pas 'di ltar bya ste //
T02D1560:216a-4: thog mar rje btsun ma'i thang sku gcig rang dang nye bar bkram pa de'i spyan sngar /
T02D1560:216a-5: blu dza bzang po bshams la 'dir khyad par du sha chen gyi spos cig gal che'o //
T02D1560:216a-6: de nas bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi don du //
T02D1560:216a-7: rje btsun ma 'di bsgrub po snyam du sems bskyed la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D1560:216a-8: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byas la de'i rjes la //
T02D1560:216a-9: thang sku la mig bltas la sems shin tu ma
T02D1560:216a-10: yengs par de ka la shes par gtad la bsgom
T02D1560:216a-11: / de nas mig na zhing ngal bar gyur na /
T02D1560:216a-12: mig btsums la yid kyi yul du rje btsun ma de /
T02D1560:216a-13: thang sku la bris pa de ka lta bu gcig mdun du bsgom /
T02D1560:216a-14: bzhugs tshul ni kurma p'a da /
T02D1560:216a-15: bya ba rus sbal gyi 'dug lugs dang 'dra ba yin pas /
T02D1560:216a-16: mtshan yang rus sbal zhabs bya ba yin /
T02D1560:216a-20: thang sku dang yid la yod pa gnyis khyad mi 'dug na dmigs pa zin pa yin pas /
T02D1560:216a-21: yang bdag nyid kyi lte bar padma dkar po 'dab
T02D1560:216a-22: ma bzhi pa cig gi lte bar sna tshogs padma
T02D1560:216a-25: zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa gcig pa kha sbub tu bsgyel ba /
T02D1560:216a-26: gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa /
T02D1560:216a-27: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs rus pa'i rgyan can
T02D1560:216a-28: cig gi thog tu mi lpags rlon pa'i gdan bting
T02D1560:216a-29: ba'i steng du rje btsun ma sku mdog ser mo
T02D1560:216b-1: g-yas gri gug 'dzin pa'i phyag thur la brkyang ba /
T02D1560:216b-2: g-yon pa thod pa thugs kar 'dzin pa /
T02D1560:216b-3: dbu skra ser po thur du 'phyang ba /
T02D1560:216b-4: me mgo rlon pa'i phreng ba yod ba /
T02D1560:216b-5: zhabs gnyis pa kha ru bzhugs pa /
T02D1560:216b-6: phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa /
T02D1560:216b-7: 'od zer bskal ba'i me ltar 'bar ba cig tu bskyed la bsgom /
T02D1560:216b-8: de ltar bsgoms pas ye shes skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1560:216b-12: phyi rol gyi rtog pa 'gags nas /
T02D1560:216b-13: 'gul mi shes pa lta bu byung na thun ran par bsgom /
T02D1560:216b-17: bzlas pa bya ba'i thabs ni /
T02D1560:216b-18: rje btsun ma gong du bshad pa ltar bskyed la /
T02D1560:216b-19: sems ma yengs pa'i sgo nas /
T02D1560:216b-20: aom badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye h'um phat sv'a phat /
T02D1560:216b-22: de ltar bzlas pa tshar nas gtor ma gtang ba ni /
T02D1560:216b-23: skyes pa'i thod pa dum bu gcig pa'am /
T02D1560:216b-24: gzhan gang yang rung ba'i nang du gtor ma bshams la /
T02D1560:216b-25: 'bru gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D1560:216b-26: rje btsun ma mdun du dmigs la snying po de lan gsum mam bdun brjod pas /
T02D1560:216b-27: mdun gyi rje btsun ma des gsol bar bsam /
T02D1560:216b-28: 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab /
T02D1560:216b-29: yi ge brgya pa brjod pas lhag chad kha bskang zhing bzod par gsol /
T02D1560:216b-30: de ltar bsgoms pas che 'di nyid la phyag rgya
T02D1560:216b-31: chen po mchog gi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ro
T02D1560:216b-32: // kurma p'a da zhes bya ba'i gdams pa phag mo thugs kyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02D1560:216b-34: // / pandi ta a'a nanda ka ra'i zhal snga nas
